title: Boundaries, Limits and the Edge of Time
description:
Dave has a degree in Astrophysics and is a Computer Programmer.
He and I discuss boundaries from various perspectives and how
they relate at many different levels:
Relational, Social, Psychological, Physical, Political,
Personality, Structural, Astronomic, Microscopic, Artistic,
Economic, Moral

The question one always needs to ask:  At what scale?
Does light know the trajectory it will take?

Boundaries by Henry Cloud and John Townsend
The Hierarchy of Heaven and Earth by Douglas Harding
